column4: Question im trying to move a file to a system area i tryed gksu nautilus and typed my password then tryed to copy paste the file ..didnt work please help
surely you can do it from the gui?
i find it much SAFER to use the CLI. ive seen peopel running nautilus as root have at times really messed up their systems.
you do realize you could just use the users own personal xchat directories.. theres no real need to copy it syst4mwide.
